Setup git workspace

  1. git clone https://github.com/manoochehri/jkmm-initial-prototype.git

  2. cd jkmm-initial-prototype

  3. git flow init

    Setup python and app server

  4. virtualenv venv (venv is in .gitignore)

  5. pip install -r requirements.txt

  6. Get app server going: gunicorn distillerizer:app; check it works

    Now connect to nginx:

  7. cp nginx.conf /usr/local/etc/nginx/

  8. nginx

    try it out end-to-end

  9. static url

  10. rest proxy
